title: Which are some cool apps for drone photography? - Quora

response.answer_text: Photographers never stop looking for picture-perfect moments. With Smartphone cameras now offering great optics to capture high resolution, sharp results, a lot of images get clicked on the mobile phones now. There is a tonne of photo apps available that let you shoot, edit and organize images better on the mobile phone. Here are top photo apps to download: VSCOGoogle SnapseedPocket Light MeterAdobe Lightroom for mobileCamera+PixlrAdobe Photoshop ExpressGoogle Photo ScanCortex cameraEnlightSylightMexturesReference: The Best 25 Photo Apps - Ultimate List for Photographers
